content: with gap for a mug handle version 2 using 4mm needles co 48 stitches in mc switch to 4mm needles row 5-21 work in chosen colourwork pattern using mc and cc ribbing switch back to 3 5mm needles row 23 *k2 p2* repeat to end row 24 *p2 k2* repeat to end repeat row 23 and 24 once more co 48 stitches finishing wrap your knitted piece around your mug wrong side out stitch the edge stitches of the top three row together above the handle and the bottom three row below the handle remove from mug weave in ends wash and block if desired © pattern knits 2024 for personal use only
